title: rediculous point earning in rank game
body: Although i know the players would lose more point in the rank games when the enemies are in lower rank level, but how could people lose nearly 30  point in a game? that is so rediculous and unfair, riot needs to change it to make sure when the players would not easy to be dropped down in rank when they get bad teammates.

replies.body:
riot has a policy of "players are able to rank up even with a 50/50 win ratio" 

So their logic is...

Give them -30 points for a loss and 12 for a win

Having the same problem in lower tiers. I have no clues as to how they calculate the difference. If the match-ups are correct, then the rewards should be equal to all and not difference to different players.

I'm fine with losing 30 LP if my MMR is horrifying but I'd like my rates to be consistent. Some games I'll play with D3s and get +20 then I'll play with people from D3-Challenger and get +12. It makes no sense at all.
